challenge.title: Variables Types
challenge.description:
In the code below we have 3 variables declared.
Define a value for each variable following the following types:

myName (string)
myAge (number)
isOpen (boolean)

The variable value is not important, just the type.
challenge.code:
let myName, myAge, isOpen;
[---editable---
// your code here

---editable---]
[---hidden---
return () => [myName, myAge, isOpen]
---hidden---]

previousChallenge.title: Const
previousChallenge.description:
In the code below we have a variable "myNumber" that is being changed by a random number.

Prevent the variable from changing by changing its declaration with "const".
